exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params e : entry l : list entry i : logIndex e' : entry Heq : (eIndex e =? i) = false Hlt : (eIndex e <? i) = false H : (fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end) l i = Some e' Unable to unify "(fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end) l i = Some e'" with "In e' l".

original: intros l i e' H. unfold findAtIndex in H. destruct l. - discriminate. - simpl in H. destruct (eIndex e =? i) eqn:Heq. + inversion H. subst. apply in_eq. + destruct (eIndex e <? i) eqn:Hlt. * discriminate. * apply in_cons. apply H.
